channel.description: Recent content in writing on Mingwei Gu

item.title: 4 Self Limiting Questions
item.description: For far too long, I’ve had trouble getting through creative work without interruption. Specifically, in the middle of work I’m doing, I’d think about the appropriate level of quality. About whether it’ll be successful. About what it means for my identity. And to my future. My mind goes wandering. And I want to do anything but do the actual task at hand. I’d go on social media or check my email.
